item.title: Net: QueryParam
item.description:
Description

The QueryParam class defines query paramters.

Properties

Name

Name

public string Name { get; set; }

TypeCode

Data type code.

public TypeCode TypeCode { get; set; }

Required

Required option.

public bool Required { get; set; }

DefaultValue

Default value.

public object DefaultValue { get; set; }

Description

Description

public string Description { get; set; }

item.title: Net: ResponseData
item.description:
Description

The ResponseData class defines response data parameters.

Properties

Name

Name

public string Name { get; set; }

StatusCode

Status code

public int StatusCode { get; set; }

Description

Description

public string Description { get; set; }

Schema

Schema

public object Schema { get; set; }
